data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Dundgovi.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dundgovi, Mongolia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Dundgovi, Mongolia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Dundgovi.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Dundgovi, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Tsaatan people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, you gave the church of Dundgovi, Mongolia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Dundgovi, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 46,400 people living in Dundgovi, Mongolia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

location.name: Dundgovi
location.people_groups_list: Uzemchin, Uriankhai, Altai, Buriat, Mongolia, Deaf, Kalmyk-Oirat
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Uzemchin (3,000), Uriankhai, Altai (31,000), Buriat, Mongolia (57,000), Deaf (16,000), Kalmyk-Oirat (261,000)
